strings.feedbackText: Found a bug? Have a question?

markup.description: The Keyboard Accessibility Plugin allows makes it easy for developers to add keyboard handlers to their code without a lot of extra overhead.
markup.instructions:
• Tab to the images. Arrow keys move the focus, and 'Space,' 'Return' or 'Enter' open the current image in the viewer.
  • Try tabbing to the 'five star rating' widget and using the arrow keys and Enter to rate the image.
